thread.title: Helen
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by Helen

author: Helen
title: Helen
text: I used to do a lot of business with American Frame when I was more into photography, matting and framing my images, and selling them. But lo, my focus has changed, and I had not done any of that kind of work for at least a few years. However, I recently needed some frames and immediately went to American Frame and was entirely impressed with the on-line interactive ordering process and delivery. I have not yet opened the package, but I trust the materials are as good as ever. I would hope, though, that American Frame was not so often out of stock for standard walnut frames. :(
